item.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 Price Won't Get Hit By Trump's Tariffs
item.description: Preorders for the console will resume next week at the previously announced price of $450 but accessories are getting more expensive.

item.title: 14 Best Tablets (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We’ve tested all the top slates, from Apple’s iPads to Android and Windows devices, and rounded up our favorites.

item.title: Meta's Monopoly Made It a Fair-Weather Friend
item.description: As the FTC trial has shown, a lack of competition allowed the company to shift its focus away from users—and toward its bottom line.

item.title: The Best N95, KF94, and KN95 Face Masks (2025)
item.description: Wildfire season is coming. Here are the best disposable face coverings we’ve tested—and where you can find them.

item.title: My Fleece Jacket Is See-Through: Alpha Direct and Grid Fleece
item.description: The gorpcore backpackers are wearing a breathable fabric called Alpha Direct or grid fleece. It’s coming for your cover-ups.
